aboutus.description: Rodas Denizcilik Gemicilik Turizm San. Ltd. Sti. It was established in 2022 with its experienced staff in the region where it is located.

content.text:
Rodas Denizcilik Gemicilik Turizm San. Ltd. Sti.

It was established in 2022 with its experienced staff in the region where it is located. As an activity, it is designed for all kinds of activities in every branch of the maritime industry.

  • Consultancy and support to national and international investors
  • Ship and boat agency
  • Bosphorus agency
  • Ship management, fishing, ship trading, maritime law consultancy
  • Personnel services, classification

Rodas Marine, an Eastern Black Sea company, is located in this region. It carries out the necessary works for the supply and certification required for fishing companies and fishing vessels.

It is a company that directs the investors with maritime interest in the region and plans their target policies.

Modern and high quality service understanding. Setting out with Rodas Marine, it has aimed to contribute to maritime with fast, quality and safe service.

services.description: Ship agency, operation and transportation, ship purchase-sale and insurance, ship maintenance and repair, maritime law consultancy, seafarer training etc. We offer services.
